name: save-back-to-file-from-dom
title: Save Back to File from DOM
description: Save back a file URI scheme document, but save from DOM, which means it would save changes effected by JavaScript.
author: srguiwiz

preferences.name: onlyIfURIMatchesRegEx
preferences.title: Only If URI Matches Regular Expression
preferences.description: Only if URI matches regular expression. Default is ^file://.*$. Note: It cannot get around hard file URI scheme limitation.

preferences.name: showActionButton
preferences.title: Show Save Back Icon
preferences.description: Whether to show Save Back to File icon in the Add-on Bar.

preferences.name: showConfirmationDialog
preferences.title: Ask For Confirmation For Save Back
preferences.description: Whether to show confirmation dialog for Save Back to File.

preferences.name: resultNameSuffix
preferences.title: Result Name Suffix
preferences.description: What to append to filename when doing Save to Result. Default is -result. Expression utc() fills in UTC.

preferences.name: showActionButton2
preferences.title: Show Save Result Icon
preferences.description: Whether to show Save to Result File icon in the Add-on Bar.

preferences.name: showConfirmationDialog2
preferences.title: Ask For Confirmation For Save Result
preferences.description: Whether to show confirmation dialog for Save to Result File.
